name: Runeswap
description:
You have heard news of a mystical grimoire hidden deep inside the ruins of an ancien city of powerful mages. Harnessing the power to swap places with magical runes your mission will be to explore those ruins in search of the famed grimoire. Will you be able to recover it or will you be stopped in your tracks by the many enigmas of the ruins.

Runeswap is a 3D puzzle plateformer where you control a mage that must reach the end of the ruins using his ability to swap with magical runes. He will also be aided by special runes which have varying powers such as explosion or attraction.

The Team :

Samuel Marrache - Game Designer

Nino Barbier - Game Designer

Hector Brun - Game Programmer

Macéo Prévost - Game Programmer

Eliott Labelette - Game Artist
